# Index

<!-- set up the dates over which the journal will run --> 
```{r  include=FALSE}
dates <- seq(as.Date("2018-01-01"), as.Date("2018-12-31"), by="1 day")
dates <- data.frame(date=dates, 
                    month=sapply(months(dates), function(x) substr(x, 1, 3)),
                    day=sapply(weekdays(dates), function(x) substr(x, 1, 1)))
month <- as.character(unique(dates$month))
```
